remarks: A limit point of a function is a cluster point of the function. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)
statement: flfssfcf $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ L e. ( Fil ` Y ) /\ F : Y --> X ) -> ( ( J fLimf L ) ` F ) C_ ( ( J fClusf L ) ` F ) ) $.
